topFooter.title2: to Receive Latest News and Special Offers

aboutusPage.h1: More Than a Club, We're a Community
aboutusPage.p: Welcome to PariTime Tennis Club, where passion for the game meets a vibrant community spirit. Nestled in the heart of Zanjan, we are more than just a place to play tennis; we are a home for players of all ages and abilities who share a love for this incredible sport.

mession.title: Our Mession
mession.p: Since our founding in 2005, our mission has been simple: to foster a welcoming, supportive, and dynamic environment where everyone from absolute beginners to seasoned competitors can thrive. We believe that tennis is a game for life, offering not just physical fitness but also friendship, challenge, and joy.

Facilities.title: Our World-ClassFacilities
Facilities.title2: We take pride in offering exceptional facilities to enhance your playing experience:
Facilities.p1: 24 Well-Maintained Courts: Enjoy a perfect game on our 6 Har-Tru clay courts, 4 hard courts, and 2 indoor courts for year-round play.
Facilities.p2: The Clubhouse: Our modern clubhouse is the social hub of the club, featuring a pro shop, locker rooms, and a cozy lounge area perfect for relaxing after a match.
Facilities.p3: Lighted Courts: Don't let the sun set on your game! Our outdoor courts are fully lighted for evening play.

Programs.title: Our Programs: For Every Player
Programs.title2: Whether you're looking to pick up a racket for the first time or compete in a championship tournament, we have a program for you.
Programs.p1: Junior Development: Our award-winning coaching program nurtures young talent, focusing on skill development, sportsmanship, and a lifelong love for the game.
Programs.p2: Adult Clinics & Lessons: Sharpen your skills with our team of friendly, USPTA-certified professionals. We offer group clinics, private lessons, and cardio tennis sessions.
Programs.p3: Social Play & Leagues: Get in the game with our organized mixers, round-robins, and competitive ladder leagues for all skill levels
Programs.p4: Tournaments: Test your mettle and have fun at our member tournaments and social events held throughout the year.

review.title: Amazing Courts
review.p: “This tennis club has the most clean and well functional courts i have seen.”
review.name: Arina lando

landing.title: 50% off For your Very First Order
landing.p: Get Unique Tennis Equipment with our various Collections. shop now to look PERFECT on Court.

hirePage.title: Hire a Coach
hirePage.p: We are offering you to hire one of the experienced coaches. here you can find the coach that meets your needs. You can easily contact them and set a schedual

singleCoachPage.name: Tom Hilder
singleCoachPage.p1: Elevating players to their peak performance through personalized training, mental fortitude, and a passion for the game
singleCoachPage.speechp: “ We're going to start simple. We're going to laugh when we whiff, and we're going to cheer when we get it—even if it’s just once. Tennis isn't about being perfect. It's about being a little better than you were yesterday. It's about the workout you didn't realize you were getting, the stress you're crushing with every forehand, and the friends you make on this side of the net.”
